Rule.Name: sPatch
Rule.Query: contains($sPatchDN,$n4DigitSKUVersion) and not(contains($sPatchTargets,'Proof')) and not(contains($sPatchTargets,'MUI')) and $sState='MSIPATCHSTATE_APPLIED' and( contains(lower-case($sPatchDN),lower-case($appName)) or contains($sPatchDN,concat('Office ',$n4DigitSKUVersion)) or contains($sPatchDN,concat($n4DigitSKUVersion,' Microsoft Office')) )
Rule.Text: Installed on {1}. Uninstallable: {2}. Targets: {3}. More info: {4}

Rule.Name: sKB2986156Installed
Rule.Query: (../Instance[contains(@Name,'2986156')])=true() and (lower-case($appName)='outlook' or lower-case($appName)='word' or lower-case($appName)='powerpoint' or lower-case($appName)='excel')

Rule.Text: Upgrading to Office 2010 or later will give you the most support options. Please see the following link for support options that are no longer available after mainstream support has ended for a product http://support.microsoft.com/gp/lifePolicy.

Rule.Name: sOffice14OutOfMainstreamSupport
Rule.Title: Office 2010 is out of mainstream support
Rule.Text:
Upgrading to Office 2013 or later will give you the most support options.
Please click the 'Click here ...' link for complete details on the Microsoft Support Lifecycle.

Rule.Name: sOffice12Or14AndCloudUser
Rule.Title: Probable reduced functionality with Outlook {0}
Rule.Text:
Office 365 works with any version of Office in mainstream support: the latest version of Office (Office 365 ProPlus) and Office 2013. Previous versions of Office clients (in your case, Office {0}), may work with Office 365 with reduced functionality.
Please click the 'Click here ...' link for additional details.
